params._bufferCap: the buffer cap for this rateLimitedAddress
params._rateLimitPerSecond: the rate limit per second for this rateLimitedAddress
params.rateLimitedAddress: the new address to add as a rateLimitedAddress
the new address to add as a rateLimitedAddress gives the newly added contract the maximum allowable rate limit per second and buffer cap

buffer().details: replenishes at rateLimitPerSecond per second up to bufferCap

params._individualMaxBufferCap: maximum buffer cap in multi rate limited
params._individualMaxRateLimitPerSecond: maximum rate limit per second per address in multi rate limited
params._maxRateLimitPerSecond: maximum amount of fei that can replenish per second ever, this amount cannot be changed by governance
params._rateLimitPerSecond: maximum rate limit per second per address

params.rateLimitedAddress: the address whose buffer will be returned

returns._0: the buffer of the specified rate limited address
